name: CatLife: BitLife Cats
description:
What would it be like to live life as a cat?

Say hello to CatLife, the NEWEST addicting text-based life simulation game from the creators of BitLife!

Will you be a sassy, independent stray kitty, a lovable smitten kitten, or the companion to a cat lady who’s a little bit crazy in this interactive storytelling life sim game? Your story is YOURS to unfold as you interact with HUNDREDS of scenarios on your journey to become the sweetest (or BADDEST) kitty in town. This addictive game will have you coming back for more–no two CatLife lives are the same!

There are SO many breeds to choose from! Play as a Persian, Himalayan, Maine coon, Siamese, calico, sphynx, and MUCH MORE!

⬆️ Climb to the TOP of the animal hierarchy. Show everyone you’re the coolest cat around, and SCHOOL everyone on why cats are better than dogs!

🏠 Where will you live? Choose one of FOUR unique habitats as the starting point for your cat’s story: a household, a shelter, a pet store, or a stray cat on the streets.

🎗️ COLLECT achievements and ribbons to commemorate the stories you’ve lived!

😻 Introducing our ALL-NEW kennel feature! Send kittens to your friends!

🐶 INTERACT with other animals! Will you continue the feud between cats and dogs, or will you be a paw-some pal?

🐾 Got a special kitty in your life? Use our custom character feature to recreate your precious pet and live out their virtual life!

🙀 What’s that wet dog smell?! Become the scent collector as you add as many smells to your scent database as possible!

😈 Don’t be idle! Work your way through DOZENS of scenarios that’ll put you at the top of the food chain! Show other animals around you that you don’t play games.

The possibilities are ENDLESS! Your choices determine your fate. Start your CatLife journey ASAP and see how your sims’ stories unfold!
